faqs.question: Do I need to know Kannada? Any local customs to follow?
faqs.answer:
üó£Ô∏è *Language & Local Customs:*

*Language:*
‚Ä¢ *English works everywhere* - Especially in offices, malls, restaurants
‚Ä¢ *Hindi widely understood*
‚Ä¢ *Kannada nice-to-know* but not essential

*Basic Kannada Phrases:*
‚Ä¢ Namaskara = Hello
‚Ä¢ Dhanyavadagalu = Thank you
‚Ä¢ Hegiddira? = How are you?
‚Ä¢ Kannada gottilla = I don't know Kannada

*Customs:*
‚Ä¢ Dress modestly when visiting temples
‚Ä¢ Remove shoes before entering homes
‚Ä¢ Right hand for eating/giving
‚Ä¢ Tipping 5-10% in restaurants appreciated

*Note:* Bangalore is very cosmopolitan - you'll feel at home!

faqs.question: Do I need to know Telugu or Urdu? Any local customs?
faqs.answer:
üó£Ô∏è *Language & Culture in Hyderabad:*

*Language:*
‚Ä¢ *English sufficient* - Works in IT areas, malls, offices
‚Ä¢ *Hindi understood* almost everywhere
‚Ä¢ *Telugu/Urdu* - Nice but not necessary

*Useful Phrases:*
‚Ä¢ Namaste = Hello
‚Ä¢ Sukriya = Thank you (Urdu/Hindi)
‚Ä¢ Baagundi = Good (Telugu)
‚Ä¢ Kitna? = How much? (Hindi)

*Local Culture:*
‚Ä¢ Hyderabadi Tehzeeb - Very polite culture
‚Ä¢ Traditional salwar/jeans fine, modest dress for Old City
‚Ä¢ Ramzan time - Many eateries closed daytime
‚Ä¢ Biryani etiquette - Eat with hands for authentic experience!

*Special:*
‚Ä¢ Friday afternoons quieter due to prayers
‚Ä¢ Irani chai culture - Must try at cafes

faqs.question: Do I need to know Marathi? Any local customs to follow?
faqs.answer:
üó£Ô∏è *Language & Local Culture:*

*Language:*
‚Ä¢ *English widely spoken* - Especially in Magarpatta, IT areas
‚Ä¢ *Hindi works perfectly*
‚Ä¢ *Marathi not required* but appreciated

*Simple Marathi:*
‚Ä¢ Namaskar = Hello
‚Ä¢ Dhanyawad = Thank you
‚Ä¢ Kasa ahes? = How are you? (to male)
‚Ä¢ Baray = Good/Fine

*Pune Culture:*
‚Ä¢ *Youth city* - Very open and liberal
‚Ä¢ Traditional + Modern mix
‚Ä¢ Ganesh Chaturthi (Aug-Sep) - Big festival, exciting time
‚Ä¢ Dress casual - Jeans/t-shirts perfectly fine

*Tips:*
‚Ä¢ Punekars love their afternoon naps (1-4 PM quieter)
‚Ä¢ Evening walks common in societies
‚Ä¢ Very safe city, but normal precautions apply
